title: Hydra
data:
The **hydra** is a monster that exists in both [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), but is implemented very differently in both variants.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [1.1 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [2 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
- [3 Mythos](#Mythos)
- [4 See also](#See_also)

* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").

* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2339](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2339 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") the hydra is one of two non-dragons to use the D glyph, the other being the [wyvern](/wiki/Wyvern "Wyvern"). True to its source mythos, it has a large number of bite attacks. It cannot, however, grow new heads when attacked with a sword.

### Strategy

These should not pose a problem by the time one encounters them; they are somewhat slow, do only a moderate amount of damage, and have no particular special attacks. They do have a large amount of hit points and a decent AC, though, in addition to resisting stoning.

## SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") the hydra uses the : glyph and can grow new heads.

## Mythos

The hydra is of course the monster from Greek mythology. It's full name being the Lernaean Hydra (Λερναῖα Ὕδρα). It is a large, snake-like monster, with multiple heads, that Heracles fought, which would grow two new heads for every one chopped off.

It may also be a reference to the [same monster](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Hydra) in [Crawl](/wiki/Linley%27s_Dungeon_Crawl "Linley's Dungeon Crawl"), which also uses the D glyph. It is one of the more notable monsters in Crawl, as it does have the ability to regrow heads, and will do so whenever attacked with a non-flaming edged weapon.

## See also

- [Wyvern](/wiki/Wyvern "Wyvern")
- [Dragon](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon")
html:
Hydra

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The hydra is a monster that exists in both SLASH'EM and SpliceHack, but is implemented very differently in both variants.

Contents

  • 1 SLASH'EM
    • 1.1 Strategy
  • 2 SpliceHack
  • 3 Mythos
  • 4 See also

SLASH'EM

D hydra
Difficulty 32
Attacks Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8
D hydra
Difficulty 32
Attacks

Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8

Base level 26
Base experience 1087
Speed 9
Base AC -4
Base MR 20
Alignment 7 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 4500
Nutritional value 500
Size Gigantic
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

A hydra:

  • can fly.
  • has no hands.
  • has a thick hide.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • hits creatures as a +2 weapon.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2339

In SLASH'EM the hydra is one of two non-dragons to use the D glyph, the other being the wyvern. True to its source mythos, it has a large number of bite attacks. It cannot, however, grow new heads when attacked with a sword.

Strategy

These should not pose a problem by the time one encounters them; they are somewhat slow, do only a moderate amount of damage, and have no particular special attacks. They do have a large amount of hit points and a decent AC, though, in addition to resisting stoning.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack the hydra uses the : glyph and can grow new heads.

Mythos

The hydra is of course the monster from Greek mythology. It's full name being the Lernaean Hydra (Λερναῖα Ὕδρα). It is a large, snake-like monster, with multiple heads, that Heracles fought, which would grow two new heads for every one chopped off.

It may also be a reference to the same monster in Crawl, which also uses the D glyph. It is one of the more notable monsters in Crawl, as it does have the ability to regrow heads, and will do so whenever attacked with a non-flaming edged weapon.

See also

  • Wyvern
  • Dragon

rawPage:
The '''hydra''' is a monster that exists in both [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SpliceHack]], but is implemented very differently in both variants.

== SLASH'EM ==

{{ monster
 |name=hydra
 |difficulty=32
 |level=26
 |experience=1087
 |speed=9
 |AC=-4
 |MR=20
 |align=7
 |frequency=1
 |genocidable=Yes
 |attacks=Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8, Bite 2d8
 |resistances conveyed=poison (100%)
 |resistances=poison, petrification
 |attributes={{attributes|A hydra|fly=1|thick=1|nohands=1|seeinvis=1|carnivore=1|hostile=1|strong=1|nasty=1|greedy=1|jewels=1|magic=1|hitastwo=1}}
 |size=Gigantic
 |nutr=500
 |weight=4500
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2339]]
}}

In [[SLASH'EM]] the hydra is one of two non-dragons to use the {{white|D}} glyph, the other being the [[wyvern]].  True to its source mythos, it has a large number of bite attacks.  It cannot, however, grow new heads when attacked with a sword.

===Strategy===
These should not pose a problem by the time one encounters them; they are somewhat slow, do only a moderate amount of damage, and have no particular special attacks.  They do have a large amount of hit points and a decent AC, though, in addition to resisting stoning.

== SpliceHack ==
In [[SpliceHack]] the hydra uses the {{white|:}} glyph and can grow new heads.

==Mythos==

The hydra is of course the monster from Greek mythology. It's full name being the Lernaean Hydra (Λερναῖα Ὕδρα). It is a  large, snake-like monster, with multiple heads, that Heracles fought, which would grow two new heads for every one chopped off.

It may also be a reference to the [http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Hydra same monster] in [[Linley's Dungeon Crawl|Crawl]], which also uses the {{brightgreen|D}} glyph.  It is one of the more notable monsters in Crawl, as it does have the ability to regrow heads, and will do so whenever attacked with a non-flaming edged weapon.

==See also==

*[[Wyvern]]
*[[Dragon]]
